full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks for that.

But the graphic on the product page for all products except the rechargeable ones is incorrect.

We just wanted the background of this graphic to be solid blue, not changing to the same as the rechargeable ones. As most devices only offer a 21m2 zone of protection. Note that the icon on the left is different.



ONLY the RECHARGEABLE products are to have this graphic on the product page.



Thanks,

Rosemary
